page.title: 01Pitreavie Gazateer.
page.content: Our area of South Dunfermline reaches from the housing estate of Abbeyview in the north, to North Rosyth in the south, from Pitreavie Castle Base in the east, to the beginning of Lord Elgin's estate in the west. Over the years, Dunfermline has developed and enlarged. That is why the housing estates of Pitcorthie and Izatt Avenue, among many other buildings, have been built in the north. The Pitreavie Industrial Estate in the middle of our area has grown and developed in the past years. Although much farmland has been built on, farming still goes on in our area. Running from the northwest to the southeast are the railway and Queensferry Road, crossing each other at the beginning of Rosyth. Paul Steele.
